domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump Why couldn't I get a test on Monday? I am symptomatic and have a diagnosis of pneumonia and bronchitis but was told I didn't meet the criteria and there weren't enough tests. Not once... but by two different facilities. 

You lie and people are dying. You just don't care.
